location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.271 of 1852 from the Residency in the Persian Gulf, to Mr Rosalie, care of Clodimir Maingard Esq., Mauritius

mods.abstract: Informing Mr Rosalie (supercargo of the merchant ship Lady Sale) that His Majesty's Minister at Tehran has obtained financial retribution from the Persian Government, owing to the detention of the Lady Saleat Bushire by the local authorities the previous summer, and the losses incurred as a result.
